readable.title: 757046028_ff5999f91b
readable.content: A large man in a leather costume plays a big drum beside a little boy playing a little drum . A man and a little boy beating drums . A man plays a drum and a little boy hits his own , little drum . The man with the big drum is marching next to a boy with a small drum . The small child bangs his drum whil looking at an older man doing the same .
